name: Dynamic Warm-Up
description: Gentle full-body preparation before intense workouts.

exercises.name: Arm Circles Forward
exercises.voiceCueStart: Arm circles forward. Begin with small circles, gradually larger.
exercises.formTips: Keep shoulders relaxed. Make smooth, full circles.

exercises.name: Arm Circles Backward
exercises.voiceCueStart: Arm circles backward. Start small, increase size.
exercises.formTips: Smooth motion. Feel the stretch in chest and shoulders.

exercises.name: Torso Swings
exercises.voiceCueStart: Torso swings. Arms loose, twist gently side to side.
exercises.formTips: Keep knees soft. Let arms swing naturally.

exercises.name: Hip Circles
exercises.voiceCueStart: Hip circles. Hands on hips, circle clockwise.
exercises.voiceCueNext: Rest. Next: Hip circles opposite direction
exercises.formTips: Smooth, wide circles. Feel hips loosening.

exercises.name: Forward Leg Swings (Alternate)
exercises.voiceCueStart: Forward leg swings. Hold wall if needed, swing one leg front to back.
exercises.formTips: Keep swinging leg straight. Controlled motion.

exercises.name: Side Leg Swings (Alternate)
exercises.voiceCueStart: Side leg swings. Swing leg across body and out.
exercises.voiceCueNext: Rest. Next: Marching with high knees
exercises.formTips: Stay balanced. Loosen hips and groin.

exercises.name: Marching with High Knees
exercises.voiceCueStart: Marching with high knees. Raise knees high, pump arms.
exercises.formTips: Gradually increase intensity. Wake up the body.
